FuncDef: This command specifies theservice-idof the VPRN to use for the OpenFlow control channel. The loopback address for the OF control channel in the VPRN is specified using theofc-loopbackoption.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the service ID for a VPRN instance. Values-{service-id | service-name}.
Specifies the loopback IP address in the VPRN for the OpenFlow channel to the controller. Values-ip-address:  a.b.c.d.
